Helper function for krig_helper; calculates aggregated/disaggregated raster cell size

krig_agg_helper.Rd

Helper function for krig_helper; calculates aggregated/disaggregated raster cell size

Usage

krig_agg_helper(to_krig, agg_disagg, agg_spec = "agg")

Arguments

to_krig

object to create grid for kriging, grd or r from krig_gd

agg_disagg

aggregation or disaggregation parameter, one of agg_grd, disagg_grd, agg_r, or disagg_r from krig_gd

agg_spec

whether aggregation or disaggregation is performed, options are "disagg" or "agg" (defaults to "agg")

Value

number of cells contained in final (aggregated or disaggregated) raster layer

See also

Other wingen functions: krig_helper(), wingen_do_everything()
